title: Overall [0â€“4]
stimulusHtml:
Scoring Criteria (Score Scale 0-4)

4 Bernini is correctly identified. Correctly discusses three ways in which sculpture and architecture interact to express meaning. No significant errors.

3 Bernini is correctly identified. Correctly discusses two ways in which sculpture and architecture interact to express meaning. There may be some errors.
OR
Incorrectly identifies Bernini, but essay is otherwise a "4"

2 Bernini is correctly identified. Correctly discusses one way in which sculpture and architecture interact to express meaning.
OR
Incorrectly identifies Bernini, but correctly discusses two ways in which sculpture and setting interact to express meaning.

1 Bernini is correctly identified. The answer is otherwise without merit.
OR
Incorrectly identifies Bernini, but there is one response of merit.

0 Makes an attempt, but the answer is without merit because it rewrites the question or makes only incorrect statements.
descriptions: Makes an attempt, but the answer is without merit because it rewrites the question or makes only incorrect statements.

Bernini is correctly identified. The answer is otherwise without merit.
OR
Incorrectly identifies Bernini, but there is one response of merit.

Bernini is correctly identified. Correctly discusses one way in which sculpture and architecture interact to express meaning.
OR
Incorrectly identifies Bernini, but correctly discusses two ways in which sculpture and setting interact to express meaning.

Bernini is correctly identified. Correctly discusses two ways in which sculpture and architecture interact to express meaning. There may be some errors.
OR
Incorrectly identifies Bernini, but essay is otherwise a "4"
Bernini is correctly identified. Correctly discusses three ways in which sculpture and architecture interact to express meaning. No significant errors.
